name: Heart Burn
description:
The journey of a ghost who wanders in a dungeon in hopes of discovering a way out. Being in this dungeon makes them feel uneasy.... What could it be?

Controls:
Press A to move to the left

Press D to move to the right

Press SPACEBAR to jump

Press ESC to pause


Find out the whole truth by avoiding obstacles that obscure your lost memories!

Credits:
Thea Desacola --- Graphic Design, Game Concept

Alec Dela Cruz  --- Main Programming, Level Design

Mary Anne Perlas --- Main Programming 

Nicole De Leon --- Sound Design, Programming,  Game Concept, Level Design

Nika Enriquez --- UI Design, Game Concept, Animation
